prediction: You will be endowed with robust physical happiness and prowess. You possess a natural intelligence and a strong sense of self. You are capable of independent development and will be physically strong.
brutally_honest_note: You are described as fickle-minded and unstable in your decisions. The text warns of infidelity, stating you will have two wives or unite with other females outside of marriage.

prediction: You will be gainful, scholarly, and happy. You will be endowed with good qualities, be religious, honourable, and maintain a focus on accumulating resources.
brutally_honest_note: You are prone to polygamous tendencies or multiple relationships, as the text explicitly states you will have many wives.

prediction: You will equal a lion in valour and courage. You will be endowed with all kinds of wealth, be honourable, intelligent, and possess a generally happy disposition.
brutally_honest_note: You may struggle with fidelity or monogamy, as the scripture predicts you will have two wives.

prediction: You will be endowed with deep paternal and maternal happiness and will have many brothers. You will be charming, virtuous, and physically attractive.
brutally_honest_note: You are described as lustful, suggesting a high drive for sensory or sexual gratification that may distract you.

prediction: You will be honourable and dear to the king (authority figures). If the planet is strong, you may gain significantly through speculation or high status.
brutally_honest_note: You will have only mediocre happiness from children and are predicted to lose your first child. You are also described as prone to excessive anger.

prediction: If there is a benefic aspect on this placement, you will enjoy good health and overcome your adversaries effectively.
brutally_honest_note: If there is no benefic aspect, you will be devoid of physical happiness and constantly troubled by enemies. You may suffer from health issues that limit your vitality.

prediction: If the planet is strong, you will rise to the status of a king or a powerful leader, dominating your sphere of influence.
brutally_honest_note: Your spouse may not live long. If the planet is a benefic but weak, you will wander aimlessly, face poverty, and suffer from dejection.

prediction: You will be an accomplished and learned scholar, possessing hidden knowledge or academic depth.

prediction: You will be fortunate and dear to the people. You will be a devotee of Sri Vishnu (or the preserver archetype), skilful, eloquent in speech, and endowed with wife, sons, and wealth.
brutally_honest_note: No specific negative traits are mentioned, implying your flaws may be hidden behind a facade of religious or social fortune.

prediction: You will be endowed with paternal happiness, royal honour, and fame among men. You will undoubtedly acquire self-earned wealth and professional status.

prediction: You will always be endowed with financial gains, good qualities, and widespread fame.
